function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases spread in built environments","Impact":"Risk of widespread illness and public health crisis","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to control transmission and improve air quality","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV disinfection, and ventilation control systems","People":"Building occupants, staff, and visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"}]}
